nodes.text: Brennonn was a Wookiee female who resided on the planet Kashyyyk. She was a friend of the Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, first meeting him during his time as a Jedi Padawan. Brennonn saved Jinn's life twice, though Jinn claimed that the two had saved each other on the second occasion.

At some point by the year 32 BBY, Brennonn met Jinn and his own Padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi, during a Life Day gathering, though the celebration was interrupted shortly afterward by a group of Trandoshan hunters. Brennon fought off one Trandoshan and was confonted by another, though Jinn disarmed the hunter and saved the Wookiee. However, the Trandoshan hunters managed to capture several Wookiees, as well as Jinn, before escaping.
